corrupted_lord.name: Corrupted Lord
corrupted_lord.description: A lord of the dark gods.

corrupted_lord_on_bike.name: Corrupted Lord on Bike
corrupted_lord_on_bike.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a bike.

dark_psychic.name: Dark Psychic
dark_psychic.description: A powerful marine whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side.

dark_psychic_on_bike.name: Dark Psychic on Bike
dark_psychic_on_bike.description: A powerful marine on a combat bike whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side.

daemon_champion.name: Daemon Champion
daemon_champion.description: A massive daemon gifted in the art of war.

dark_priest.name: Dark Priest
dark_priest.description: A devotee of the dark gods who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

cultist.name: Cultist
cultist.description: A lowlife who has sold their souls to the dark gods.

cultist_specialist.name: Cultist Specialist
cultist_specialist.description: A heavily armed lowlife who has sold their souls to the dark gods.

plague_walker.name: Plague Walker
plague_walker.description: An unfortunate soul who has been mutated into a walking undead.

corrupted_marine.name: Corrupted Marine
corrupted_marine.description: A marine corrupted by the dark gods.

specialist_corrupted_marine.name: Corrupted Marine Specialist
specialist_corrupted_marine.description: A marine corrupted by the dark gods, wielding experimental weapons.

corrupted_marine_leader.name: Corrupted Marine Leader
corrupted_marine_leader.description: A squad leader corrupted by the dark gods.

lord_of_pestilence.name: Lord of Pestilence
lord_of_pestilence.description: A corrupted lord of death and decay.

pestilence_psychic.name: Pestilence Psychic
pestilence_psychic.description: A powerful infected marine whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side.

pestilence_surgeon.name: Pestilence Surgeon
pestilence_surgeon.description: A doctor experimenting on others with virulent diseases.

pestilence_marine_leader.name: Pestilence Marine Leader
pestilence_marine_leader.description: A infected squad leader corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_marine.name: Pestilence Marine
pestilence_marine.description: A infected marine corrupted by the dark gods.

specialist_pestilence_marine.name: Pestilence Marine Specialist
specialist_pestilence_marine.description: A heavily armed infected marine corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_destroyer.name: Pestilence Destroyer
pestilence_destroyer.description: A destroyer that is infected with pestilence.

pestilence_elite_destroyer.name: Pestilence Elite Destroyer
pestilence_elite_destroyer.description: An elite destroyer that is infected with pestilence.

pestilence_elite_destroyer_leader.name: Pestilence Elite Destroyer Leader
pestilence_elite_destroyer_leader.description: An elite destroyer leader that is infected with pestilence.

pestilence_destroyer_leader.name: Pestilence Destroyer Leader
pestilence_destroyer_leader.description: A destroyer leader that is infected with pestilence.

corrupted_berzerker_leader.name: Corrupted Berzerker Leader
corrupted_berzerker_leader.description: A squad leader corrupted by the dark gods filled with rage.

corrupted_berzerker.name: Corrupted Berzerker
corrupted_berzerker.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods filled with rage.

corrupted_devastator_leader.name: Corrupted Devastator Leader
corrupted_devastator_leader.description: A highly trained squad leader armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

corrupted_devastator.name: Corrupted Devastator
corrupted_devastator.description: A highly trained corrupted marine armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

possessed_brother.name: Possessed Corrupted
possessed_brother.description: A corrupted marine who has been gifted with daemonic mutations to aid them in battle.

greater_possessed_brother.name: Greater Possessed Brother
greater_possessed_brother.description: A squad of corrupted marines that have been gifted with significant daemonic mutations to aid them in battle.

talon_raptor_leader.name: Talon Raptor Leader
talon_raptor_leader.description: A squad leader jumping into the fray with a jetpack.

specialist_talon_raptor.name: Talon Raptor Specialist
specialist_talon_raptor.description: A heavily armed elite corrupted marine jumping into the fray with a jetpack.

talon_raptor.name: Talon Raptor
talon_raptor.description: An elite corrupted marine jumping into the fray with a jetpack.

corrupted_destroyer_leader.name: Corrupted Destroyer Leader
corrupted_destroyer_leader.description: A destroyer that has been corrupted by the dark gods.

corrupted_destroyer.name: Corrupted Destroyer
corrupted_destroyer.description: A destroyer that has been corrupted by the dark gods.

mutated_destoyer.name: Mutated Destroyer
mutated_destoyer.description: A Destroyer that has been mutated by their dark gods.

daemon_spawn.name: Daemonic Spawn
daemon_spawn.description: A horribly mutated being that runs rampant on the battlefield.

sorcerer_lord.name: Sorcerer Lord
sorcerer_lord.description: A master of combat that leads the forces of change.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: A distinguished sorcerer who has managed to rise through the ranks of the change brothers.

change_corrupted_leader.name: Psychic Marine Sorcerer
change_corrupted_leader.description: A psychically adept change marine, fighting on as a mindless automaton.

heavy_change_corrupted.name: Psychic Marine Heavy
heavy_change_corrupted.description: A hexed corrupted marines who wields a curse-bound minigun and fights on as a mindless automaton

change_corrupteds.name: Psychic Marine
change_corrupteds.description: A hexed corrupted marine whose body has been turned to dust by a horrible curse, but fights on as an mindless automaton in their remaining armor.

change_destroyer_leader.name: Psychic Destroyer Sorcerer
change_destroyer_leader.description: A psychically adept change destroyer, fighting on as a mindless automaton.

change_destroyer.name: Psychic Destroyer
change_destroyer.description: Nothing more than dust bound to a suit of armor, this change brother fights side by side with their brothers.

birdmen_leader.name: Birdman Leader
birdmen_leader.description: A mutated half avian-half man squad leader that fights with the change brothers to acheive their goals.

birdman_sorcerer.name: Birdman Sorcerer
birdman_sorcerer.description: A mutated half avian-half man sorcerer that leads demonic forces of change.

birdman.name: Birdman
birdman.description: A mutated half avian-half man creature that fights with the change brothers to acheive their goals.

birdman_disc_rider.name: Birdman Disk Rider
birdman_disc_rider.description: An exalted birdmen riding a psychic disk.

corrupted_biker.name: Corrupted Biker
corrupted_biker.description: A corrupted marine on combat bikes.

corrupted_biker_leader.name: Corrupted Biker Leader
corrupted_biker_leader.description: A corrupted marine leader on combat bikes.

doom_siren.name: Doom Siren
doom_siren.description: Enemy units within 6" of this model suffer -1 Courage.

rifle_tactics.name: Rifle Tactics
rifle_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly Infantry units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics.name: Melee Tactics
melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly Infantry units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

archmage_tactics.name: Arch-Psyker's Tactics
archmage_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly units with the Power special rule within 6".  Those units may reroll dice rolls of 9+ while using the Power ability until the end of the round.

archmage.name: Blessings of the Psyker God
archmage.description: When this unit casts the Shock Wave Power, double the number of hits it deals.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: This weapon ignores cover and may choose the model that is hit.

psychic_helmet.name: Psychic Helmet
psychic_helmet.description: The bearer gets +1 to all Psychic tests.

war_chant.name: War Chant
war_chant.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" gain the Furious keyword.

dark_prayer.name: Dark Prayers
dark_prayer.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Blessing for this unit or a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Cloak of Shadows: Roll a die when a model in this unit loses a wound. On a value of 1 or 2 that wound is not lost.
* Eternal Hatred: When this unit fights, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Omen of Doom: This unit may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

hate.name: Hate
hate.flavor: Full with fury, corrupted marines can launch devastating close combat assaults.
hate.description: Use before an Infantry unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

unyielding.name: Unyielding
unyielding.flavor: Imbued with demonic energy, corrupted marines can call upon the powers of the dark gods to keep fighting.
unyielding.description: Use when activating an _Infantry_ unit. That unit may ignore any critical injuries it has sustained for this activation.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
fearless.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

concealment.name: Concealment
concealment.flavor: Corrupted marines are sometimes trained in stealth tactics allowing them to hide even in plain sight.
concealment.description: Use this strategy when a unit is targeted by an enemy Shooting attack. That unit gets -1 Accuracy this attack.

infiltrate.name: Infiltrate
infiltrate.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
infiltrate.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

decoy.name: Decoy
decoy.description: Use after a _Leader_ unit has been targeted by a Shooting attack within 6" of a friendly _Infantry_ unit. For this attack, you can roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to the _Infantry_ unit instead of the original target.
decoy.flavor: Unsure of which is the real leader, enemies often get confused and shoot a different target.

psychic_channeling.name: Psychic Channeling
psychic_channeling.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult psychic powers can be manifested.
psychic_channeling.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a psychic power. The spell charge value is increased by 1 and the spell has +6" of range.

hex_rounds.name: Hex Rounds
hex_rounds.flavor: Sometimes used, hex rounds are imbued with psychic fire and are highly deadly.
hex_rounds.description: Use before an Infantry unit shoots. Add +6" to the short and long range bands of all weapons.

cursed_form.name: Cursed Form
cursed_form.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
cursed_form.flavor: Psychic Corrupteds, cursed with the loss of their souls, they are less susceptible to damage.

resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.flavor: These marines are so diseased and rotten that they often shrug off some powerful attacks.
resilience.description: Use this strategy when one of your units is targeted by an attack. Roll a die for each hit, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

pestilent_aura.name: Pestilent Aura
pestilent_aura.flavor: Following these marines is an aura of death and disease.
pestilent_aura.description: Use this strategy when you activate one of your _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ units. Up to 2 units within 6" take 3 hits with AP 1 each.

pestilence_rounds.name: Pestilence Rounds
pestilence_rounds.flavor: Sometimes it is necessary to infuse marine rifle rounds with disease to cause extra damage.
pestilence_rounds.description: Use this strategy when one of your _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ units Shoots. Choose a weapon name. Each successful hit roll of 2 or less with that weapon gets +1 AP.

raze.name: Raze
raze.flavor: Burn the enemy to the ground.
raze.description: Use this strategy when one of your _Infantry_ units Shoots. Successful hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

bravery.name: Bravery
bravery.description: Use when a unit takes a Courage test. That unit gets +1 Courage.
bravery.flavor: These soldiers are particularly enduring and will not surrender.

outrun.name: Outrun
outrun.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. That unit gains +3" of Movement for that action.
outrun.flavor: These marines will let no enemy escape.

ferocity.name: Ferocity
ferocity.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. All models in that unit may make one additional attack.
ferocity.flavor: Sometimes with disregard for their own life, these marines will stop at nothing to defeat their enemies.

nullify.name: Nullify
nullify.description: Use when a Power(x) test is taken within 24" of any Infantry unit. Roll a D10. If the value is less than or equal to the test to cast the power, it is prevented.
nullify.flavor: Sometimes those that are favored by the dark gods can be protected from enemy powers.

counter_attack.name: Counter Attack
counter_attack.flavor: These marines do not let their enemy strike first.
counter_attack.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Counter Attack reaction without testing Initiative.

beam.name: Invigorating Beam
beam.description: Target friendly unit within 12"may immediately make a free move action.

magic_shield.name: Shield
magic_shield.description: Target friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.

weakness.name: Weakness
weakness.description: Target enemy unit within 18" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

illusion.name: Encroaching Mutations
illusion.description: Target enemy unit within 18" gets -1 to hit the next time it shoots or fights.

strike.name: Strike
strike.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 2 hits with AP 5.

terror.name: Terror
terror.description: Target enemy unit within 12" immediately takes 3 Shock.

death.name: Bolt
death.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 1 hit with AP 7.

storm.name: Storm
storm.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 5 hits with AP 1.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP 3.
